Constant Field Values

the_gui

Main_activity the_gui
Reference to the main activity

STOP

boolean STOP
true: thread should be stopped (exit main loop in function run())

RECONNECT_TCP

boolean RECONNECT_TCP
true: reconnect to tcp server. See: start_tcp(), read_tcp()

SENSORS_STARTED

boolean SENSORS_STARTED
true: sensors listeners have been created and attached (started), See: start_sensors(), stop_sensors()()

IOIO_STARTED

boolean IOIO_STARTED
true: ioio thread has been been created and started. See: start_IOIO(), stop_IOIO()

CAMERA_STARTED

boolean CAMERA_STARTED
true: camera feedback has been been created and started. See start_camera(), stop_camera()

NEW_IMA

boolean NEW_IMA
true: when camera starts, a new image (the_frame) will be created
false: the same image is then modified.
See start_camera(), get_camera_data()

NEW_FRAME

boolean NEW_FRAME
true: a new frame is available after calling Camera_feedback.get_data() in get_camera_data().

See start_camera(), get_camera_data()

NEW_DATA_IOIO

boolean NEW_DATA_IOIO
true: new data from the IOIO is available after calling IOIO_thread.get_IR_values() in get_ioio_data().

See get_ioio_data()

NEW_DATA_GPS

boolean NEW_DATA_GPS
true: new data from the GPS is available after calling GPS_listener.get_location() in get_sensors_data().

See get_sensors_data()

NEW_DECLI

boolean NEW_DECLI
true: used to get the earth declination only once in get_sensors_data().

See get_sensors_data()

RC_MODE

boolean RC_MODE
true: RC mode for robot. Commands are sent over network and received when reading TCP socket in read_tcp()

See read_tcp()

EXPLORE_MODE

boolean EXPLORE_MODE
true: explore mode for robot. Function to be implemented read_tcp()

See read_tcp()

INVERTED

boolean INVERTED
true if the pwm values should be inverted (e.g. for some cars: 2000= right, others 1000=right).
See read_tcp() , IOIO_thread.INVERTED

COLOR_MODE

boolean COLOR_MODE
true: send color image to server.
false: send black and white image.
See get_camera_data()

RESIZE_IMA

boolean RESIZE_IMA
true: resize image sent to server.
See get_camera_data()

Method Detail

run

public final void run()
Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable
Overrides:
run in class java.lang.Thread

stop_thread

public void stop_thread()
stops the thread

stop_all

private void stop_all()
Stop camera, ioio and sensors (if running), by calling stop_camera() , stop_IOIO() and stop_sensors(). Called when tcp connection is lost in check_tcp(), and when the thread is stopping in run().

See Also:
stop_camera(), stop_IOIO(), stop_sensors()

start_tcp

private void start_tcp()
Function will try to connect to the server indefinitely. Creates and open a tcp socket, and input and output streams. If connected, sends robot/phone parameters to the server by calling send_param_tcp().

Parameters:
no - param
See Also:
send_param_tcp()

stop_tcp

private void stop_tcp()
Close input and output streams, and close the tcp socket.

Parameters:
no - param

send_param_tcp

private boolean send_param_tcp()
Send parameters of the phone/robot to the server (name, supported resolution camera...). Should only be called once (the first time the robot connects to the server).

Parameters:
no - param
Returns:
true if message correctly sent, false otherwise

check_tcp

private void check_tcp()
Checks tcp connection by trying to send the message "TCP_CHECK" to the server every KEEPALIVE_MAX_COUNT (e.g. 500) timesteps. If disconnected, function will stop everything and try to reconnect to the server using: stop_tcp(), stop_all(), then start_tcp()

The server should send back "TCP_OK" but we don't really care about it here, see read_tcp()

See Also:
#read_tcp()} , {@link #stop_tcp()}, {@link #stop_all()}, {@link #start_tcp()}

read_tcp

private boolean read_tcp()
Read tcp socket and perform action corresponding to message: start/stop camera, ioio, sensors, set pwm values, compression rate, mode. Also see if the server sent back "TCP_OK" message after sending "TCP_CHECK" in check_tcp()

Returns:
true if it receives a known command, false otherwise
See Also:
check_tcp()

private void start_sensors()

stop_sensors

private void stop_sensors()
